Knowledge Strengthens Mind and Soul.--What we need is knowledge that will strengthen mind and soul, that 


                                                 69 

will make us better men and women. Heart education is of far more importance than mere book learning. It is well, even essential, to have a knowledge of the world in which we live; but if we leave eternity out of our reckoning, we shall make a failure from which we can never recover. --MH 450 (1905).
